data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Antalya, Turkey to the gospel today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Antalya, Turkey

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 2,145,408, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Antalya.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 810 believers in Antalya to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Arab, Iraqi people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Antalya, Turkey who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Antalya, Turkey, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Antalya.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

location.name: Antalya
location.people_groups_list: Adyghe, Chechen, Arab, Lebanese, Jew, Spanish, Deaf
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Adyghe (350,000), Chechen (112,000), Arab, Lebanese (100,000), Jew, Spanish (16,000), Deaf (422,000)
